title: Deciphering the influence of PdII and PdIV oxidation states on non-standard chemical bonds within bis(jN-heterocyclic carbene) complexes: insights from DFT
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21075-21088
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03893B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jean Ongagna Moto, Abel Idrice Adjieufack, Simon Claude Ndika Ngomb, Gaël Mouzong D'ambassa, Suzane Leonie Djendo Mazia, Désiré Mama Bikele
Bis-N-heterocyclic carbene ligands (bis(NHC)) have introduced a new approach to designing homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysts, demonstrating the versatility of ligand concepts in catalysis.
